desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.

desc.zh_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，響提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时貝里塔斯即可开始骇入。

desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人在詠葉部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，綠立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程師部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。

desc.en: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.

Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. desc.zh_tw: 来到遊戲開發部的是研討會部长莉音。莉音说愛麗絲是「无名诸神的王女」，并说愛麗絲是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉音很平静地在谈论愛麗絲可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉音。莉音说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉音很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。

desc.en: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.jp: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.

No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.ko: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了愛麗絲的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉音则用游戏作了简单的阐述：愛麗絲是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉央则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones were partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音向众人道歉，表示让愛麗絲接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为愛麗絲接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。莉音表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。

desc.en: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.

desc.zh_tw: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将愛麗絲的光环破坏掉，即杀死愛麗絲。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉音首先表示了对愛麗絲作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉音叫来了一直在一旁的寧瑠清场。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的尼禄清场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉音首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉音叫来了一直在一旁的宁瑠清场。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的妮露清场。

desc.en: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.jp: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音表示，C&C本就直属她管理。莉音强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而寧瑠本身也对莉音的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉音很熟悉寧瑠，并早就做好了应对手段。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而妮露本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉妮露，并早就做好了应对手段。

desc.en: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.jp: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.

desc.ko: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.zh_tw: 击倒AMAS，寧瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后寧瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，綠和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，愛麗絲做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击倒AMAS，尼禄和时展开了追逐战。但最后尼禄却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击倒AMAS，妮露和时展开了追逐战。但最后妮露却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。

desc.en: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.jp: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.thai: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.ko: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉音无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将寧瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将尼禄打倒并压制。

desc.en: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.

desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠被压制后，莉音指示AMAS去回收愛麗絲。柚子和綠试图阻止，但遭莉音严厉警告。老师要求莉音住手，莉音反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉音的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师要求莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

desc.en: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了愛麗絲的身份。綠试图以工程師部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉音远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。寧瑠在一旁督促愛麗絲不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。愛麗絲会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
